title: Chests earned for S rank aren't a snowdown chest?
body: Yesterday I received a chest after getting an S on a champion. It was clearly after the game had updated for snowdown as the map had changed. However, the chest did not have the new model, and when I opened it I did not receive the  the guaranteed candy. Is this a bug, or simply the way it is meant to be?

replies.body:
The snowdown chests can only be purchased from the store, therefore, any chests earned from hitting that sweet sweet S-grade are going to be *regular hextech chests*.

Let me know if you have any questions.
